(b) All requests to inspect or copy records
subject to disclosure as provided by this Part are to be made to the
appropriate records access officer. (c) The records access officer shall provide
assistance to a requester in identifying requested records and shall ensure
that a current subject matter list (see section
603.13
[h]
of this

Part) of records is maintained. Such list shall be updated at least
semiannually. (d) The
records access appeals officer
shall mean the Counsel of
OPWDD, whose business address is: Counsel's Office, Office for People With

Developmental Disabilities, 44 Holland Avenue, Albany, NY 12229. Notes
